data.text: Mutu wowo wumvuandanga ku tsi suamunu ki Nzambi yizangama,
Ndiela tuba mu diambu di Yave :
Bukiedika niandi wela ku vukisa mu ntambu
Wela ku fukidila mu zitsala ziandi
Wulendi ko mona tsisi mu builu
Mili yimosi yilenda bua va ndambu aku
Wela tala kaka mu meso maku
Enati kitudi Nzambi yizangama buangu kiaku weti vuanda
Buna kadi mbimbi yimosi yilendi kubuila ko
Bila, mu diambu diaku, wela tumina zimbasi ziandi
Ziawu ziela kuvumuna mu mioko miawu
Ngeyo wela diatidila khosi ayi kusa ;
Yave kembi : “sumbu keta kunzola ndiela ku nkula,
Wela kuthela ayi ndiela kumvana mvutu.
Ndiela kunyukutisa mu luzingu lu mula
